channel.title: Home on Angel's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Angel's Website

item.description: Resume/CV Angel Garcia J. 702-960-9278 angel.garcia0616@icloud.com Company Role Time Period Free Cyber Clinic Training Program Developer & Co-Founder October 2021 - Now Layout training material for fellow members to achieve their Security+ & CISSP Provide in-person & virtual training to explain how to perform computer forensics & remediate for the issues present. Create labs with virtual machines provided through Apache Guacamole that are vulnerable and need to be assessed with tools like: Task Manager, Event Viewer, Task Scheduler & File Explorer NNSA MSIPP Security Researcher October 2022 - Jan 2023 Implement machine learning with datasets containing network data from IOT, SCADA, & ICS devices.
